snippet: Ousting the University of Virginia president last year was “a failure of judgment and, alas, of common sense,” the American Association of University Professors said in a scathing report.
abstract: American Assn of University Professors, in scathing report, says ousting University of Virginia president Teresa A Sullivan in 2012 was 'a failure of judgment and, alas, of common sense;' she was reinstated after 16 days.
lead_paragraph: Ousting the University of Virginia president last year was “a failure of judgment and, alas, of common sense,” the American Association of University Professors said in a scathing report.

headline.seo: Virginia: Report by Professors Faults University in Firing of President
headline.main: Virginia: Report by Professors Faults University in Firing of President
headline.print_headline: Virginia: Report By Professors Faults University In Firing of President
